elements.title: southern greater glider (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 2020, scientists confirmed that the southern greater glider (pictured), northern greater glider and central greater glider were not one species as had previously been believed?

elements.title: Nguyễn Thúy Hiền (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that wushu athlete Nguyễn Thúy Hiền was voted the best Vietnamese female athlete of the 20th century?

elements.title: Bishop Sycamore High School (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after Bishop Sycamore High School lost a televised football game 58–0, it was reported that the school did not teach its students?

elements.title: Elvira Bierbach (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Elvira Bierbach has run an alternative medicine school for heilpraktiker in Bielefeld since 1992?

elements.title: Don't Touch That Dial (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that to portray "drunk" Vision in the WandaVision episode "Don't Touch That Dial", Paul Bettany took inspiration from Dick Van Dyke's drunk acting in The Dick Van Dyke Show?

elements.title: Yvonne Fredericks-Pearson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Guyana MP Yvonne Fredericks-Pearson competed in archery at the Indigenous Heritage Games 2019?

elements.title: American Institute of Musicology (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the American Institute of Musicology has published over 650 volumes of early music since 1946?

elements.title: Maurus Gerner-Beuerle (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Lutheran theologian Maurus Gerner-Beuerle wrote an autobiographical work about tales and pranks from his childhood?
